name: Stock Investor
description:
A prototype I made for a Game Prototyping class where we were tasked to make an incremental game similar to cookie clicker, I decided to base mine around investing and selling stocks, a stock market simulator if you will. Still an incremental game, but one where you can't just sit and watch the numbers rise, you have to make decisions based on the various fluctuations of the stock market and the competing industries.

Made using Unity 2D.

NOTE: There is a version you can download and play on your PC without the need for itch.io in case the web version is not working correctly.
